mapper.insert: insert into plan_review(user_id, plan_idx, review_content, review_img, review_rating) values (#{user_id}, #{plan_idx}, #{review_content}, #{review_img}, #{review_rating})
mapper.select:
select review_idx, user_id, plan_idx, review_content, review_img, review_rating, create_date, update_date from plan_review where 1=1
and (review_content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'))
